English (Literal): The important thing is to participate

English (Literal): To fight for a lost cause
English (Metaphorical): To fight for a lost cause

Spanish: No hay peor sordo que el que no quiere oír

Spanish: Cuando se cierra una puerta, se abre una ventana

Spanish: No es oro todo lo que reluce
English (Literal): All that glitters is not gold

English (Metaphorical): Two in distress makes sorry less
